name: L'Oréal Paris
story: L'Oréal Paris is the world's leading beauty brand, offering innovative products and unique expertise from beauty experts in makeup, skincare, hair care, styling and hair color.

name: Maybelline New York
story: Maybelline New York is the number one makeup brand worldwide, offering affordable, quality cosmetics for every woman.

name: CeraVe
story: CeraVe is developed with dermatologists and contains essential ceramides to help restore and maintain the skin's natural barrier.

name: MAC Cosmetics
story: MAC Cosmetics is the world's leading professional makeup authority because of our unrivalled expertise in makeup artistry.

name: The Ordinary
story: The Ordinary is a clinical skincare brand with integrity. We communicate with clarity and bring you effective, science-backed formulas.

name: Neutrogena
story: Neutrogena is a brand of the Johnson & Johnson Company, known for its dermatologist-recommended skincare products.

name: NYX Professional Makeup
story: NYX Professional Makeup is a professional makeup brand that offers high-quality, professional products at accessible prices.

name: La Roche-Posay
story: La Roche-Posay is a French pharmaceutical company specializing in skincare products that are formulated with thermal spring water.

name: Revlon
story: Revlon is a global beauty company that creates and markets innovative, high-quality products in color cosmetics, hair color, and beauty care.

name: Clinique
story: Clinique is a dermatologist-created brand that offers safe, effective skincare and makeup products for all skin types.

name: Garnier
story: Garnier is a global beauty brand that offers natural and organic beauty products for hair care, skin care, and sun care.

name: NIVEA
story: NIVEA is one of the world's largest skin care brands, offering products for all skin types and ages.
